record.id: field.name="audience.type" and file.name="inbox" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: audience.type
record.file.name: inbox

brief.brief: The kind of audience for which the favorite will be available.

detail.detail: Selected Operator: The favorite can be seen only by the specified operator. Can be different from the favorite owner.
Selected Groups: The favorite can be seen only by operators belonging to at least one of the specified query groups. Query groups are set in the Startup tab of the Operator records.
Everyone: The favorite has no access restriction other than the one defined by its containers hierarchy.
Note: An operator can see a favorite provided he belongs to the audience defined for this favorite AND to the audiences defined for the whole hierarchy of containers leading to this favorite.
